author: tobrien
title: Paperless Cross-Border Trade
description: 由于软件和专业知识价格高昂，发展中国家在实现无纸贸易的巨大利益方面面临挑战。

f6_assessments.q0: 上述建议可能带来的影响是巨大的。这是一个以简单而精致的方式提出的出色想法。建议的解决方案明确提到了目标登记处，即 "海关和边境控制"，这是活动简介中的必要条件之一。目标用户群是肯尼亚和加纳，这两个国家仍然是发展中国家，为了可预见的持续繁荣，需要这种解决方案。提议者还提到，该解决方案已经在以太坊链上运行，但希望能将其转移到Cardano链上。因此，在成功实施后，该提案不仅会在全球范围内产生影响，推动新的参与者，也会吸引很多现有的参与者转移到Cardano，以克服他们在各自当前链上可能面临的漏洞。
f6_assessments.q1: 提案人蒂姆和乔纳森是社区的知名人士，他们的专业知识毋庸置疑。他们在计划的细节方面所做的努力当然需要得到赞赏。提议者为社区和读者提供了一个清晰的路线图，包括清晰的阶段性目标、资源要求、涉及的风险和可衡量的指标。团队提供了一个非常简短的团队风味和他们可能为生态系统带来的经验。然而，要求的资金最多占挑战赛分配资金的25%。尽管这一数额似乎对团队提出的相当大的工作量是公平的，但这对挑战中的其他想法是不公平的。我建议该团队在随后的几轮融资中，通过展示一些从基金7的拨款中获得的进展，提出一部分基金。在发表了我的意见后，我相信在可行性方面得到4分（满分5分）将对该提案非常公正。
f6_assessments.q2: 然而，该团队在提供审计过程的指标时没有任何保留。提案人提到了他们对每个里程碑的期望结果和各自的成功指标。该提案包括所有需要的指标，人们应该期待通过活动简报，无论是Dapp使用案例和交易数量的增加，与国际组织的合作，对金融包容性的影响，以及全球范围的拓展，这些都是目前挑战的关键指标。此外，该团队计划将应用程序作为开源产品提供，并通过催化剂渠道提供应用程序演示，这使得该提案更加可行和值得信赖。有了以上所有的事实，很明显，该提案有足够好的关键绩效指标来监测其进展和最终的成功。因此，我为其打满分。

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal seeks to solve the problem of high cost of customs paperwork in cross-border trace by moving the TradeTrust framework of electronic trade documents to Cardano which aligns exceptionally well with the challenge goal of foundational Customs & Border Control registry.  
The proposal is an excellent example of articulating the value to Cardano ecosystem, articulating how the solution scales to address future challenges, providing key metrics and goals that closely align with the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal's feasibility could be improved by a challenges and risks section however given that the application is currently functioning the risks are likely minimal.
The proposal's feasibility is excellently demonstrated by evidence of experience (existing application), team composition, budget is broken down and reasonable, realistic timetable and plan, resources required, detailed technical explanation of the solution.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes excellent examples of a roadmap, milestones, time horizon, metrics/KPIs to measure proposal success, a clear understandable description of the targeted problem, a detailed description of the solution that addresses the problem. Overall the proposal is an excellent example for future proposers to follow.

f6_assessments.q0: The use case of this proposal is very interesting as it is designed to improve the current way of using trading documents. It's clear that paper based trading systems can be daunting, heavy and not optimized. The proposer has brought a solution that will use the cardano network to verify documents and enable rapide trading execution between parties. From the video published in the proposal, the proposer explained that the product was running on the ethereum network but the gas fees made them switch to cardano. Altogether, this proposal fits really well into the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: Since the project is already up and running, with a working website on mainet, I think that it's feasibility is a matter of continuing. Furthermore, the proposer has added all the information and details needed to achieve a positive note on a successful implementation of the project. Linkedin profile links have been added as well as team members and resources needed to complete the project. The budget has been broken and seems reasonable based on my intuition. Since I'm not a technical guy, I can't judge the reasonableness of the prices. Altogether, I have  confidence in the successful implementation  of this project.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has added a roadmap with milestones that can help track its progress. Metrics and KPIs that define success are also included in the proposal. The proposer has clearly, described the problem and the solution.

f6_assessments.q0: The project aims to eliminate complicated paperwork in the process of transporting goods across borders, saving costs and time for paperwork. Currently this technology is also greatly supported in developed countries. The application is highly practical. The team has professional experience and good relationship with many government agencies.
f6_assessments.q1: The project clearly outlines the project goals, barriers, challenges, and how technology connects to achieve them. With the experience of the team and the solutions they offer are objective and feasible. But it requires a lot of time to implement as well as educate the market on the new method to be accepted for paperless cross-border freight.
f6_assessments.q2: It is possible to check the progress of the KPIs in each stage and verify with the documentation they have done through the information provided about the results of the practical application of the countries implementing this technology.

f6_assessments.q0: this proposal effectively addresses the Brief by working to place blockchain built paperless trade onto the Cardano blockchain. This is a fundamental governmental registry that is well suited for blockchains strengths.
f6_assessments.q1: This team has already built the solution and has demonstrated value. The propsoal simply seeks to move the existing solution to the Cardano chain, the team has experience and the plan is sound.
f6_assessments.q2: The plan presents operational auditable, measurable, specifc time-fenced milestones allowing the community the ability to audit this proposal's progress and success. it is nicely presented.

f6_assessments.q0: Brilliant. I recall the Government of Ghana tries to move port activities online, the initiative had a challenge integrating the process and rather cost delay. I think this proposal would be helpful, the educative component is important to integrating shipping agents and stakeholders for easy usage.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has proven evidence to ensure delivery successfully. Great team experience and I think the community should support and help the migration to Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q2: great cost breakdown. I think it would be easy to audit and trace activities.

solution: 将TradeTrust互操作性框架转移到Cardano，以促进电子贸易文件的低成本可信互操作性。
experience: 我们的团队拥有30年的跨境贸易思想领导力和区块链设计，拥有15名经验丰富的区块链工程师团队。
